4309480.name: A Stray Line
4309480.description:
A Stray Line is a point and click adventure game where you play as Taoyi Feng, a young artist who took a nap by the lakeshore.

You wake up to discover that your home, your belongings, and even the surrounding woodlands have been changed beyond recognition. People no longer remember your face, or the misfortune you caused your loved ones. There are holes in the floor, but you can't see through them.

Something out there has granted you a clean slate. This time, you won't fail to make things right.

  • Taoyi Feng: A child with all the love in the world to give. For the stars, the woodlands, and the people who took her in when she had nothing.

  • Atlas Feng: A former big city painter and mage. Now, he lives quietly in a small house with his two adoptive children, hidden away in a forest clearing. He is recovering from some injuries.

  • Winslow Feng: Tao's older sibling who enjoys teasing and playing with his friends. He is often in homemade costumes for his acting club.

  • Ilya Svetlov (“Mr. Ilya”): Atlas' friend and gardener, driver, embroiderer, fisherman on call, etc. To Taoyi and Winslow, it really seems like he can do everything.

  • The Tube: An unexpected neighbor.

  • A story about redemption, and the bond between parent and child.

  • Visual-novel segments with hand drawn cgs and animations.

  • An autumnal, pixel art world to explore and solve puzzles in.

  • Point and click drawing mechanics (works with both mouse and art tablets.)

  • The experience of having a supportive father.

  • An undiagnosed iron deficiency.

  • Scrappy stray animals to help you along your adventure.

  • Mildly strange art exhibits.

This game will be told through five chapters. The prologue and chapter one will be available for free in the upcoming demo!
